author: Karlo
description: Third-party PyLav cog to have the bot automatically set a channel status while a track is playing.
short: Third-party PyLav cog to have the bot automatically set a channel status while a track is playing.
install_msg:
This cog has no commands. It will automatically set the channel status to the currently playing track name.
If you want it to stop, unload the cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
